original: Saraṇo anuppanno dhammo nasaraṇassa naanuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye cattāri.
Araṇo uppādī dhammo naaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Araṇo
uppādī dhammo nasaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe
